title: Turbo Tunnel
prompt:
Build a Battletoads Turbo Tunnel style obstacle racing game in a single HTML file.

GAMEPLAY:
- Player is on a speeder bike rushing forward (side-scrolling or into-screen perspective)
- Obstacles come at you: walls with gaps, ramps to jump, low barriers to duck, floating hazards
- 3 lanes (left/center/right) controlled by arrow keys or A/D
- Jump with spacebar or W, duck with S or down arrow
- Speed increases every 10 seconds
- Obstacles get denser and patterns get more complex as you progress
- One hit = death, but give 3 lives
- Show distance traveled as score, track high score

VISUALS:
- Synthwave/neon aesthetic (keep the CRT vibe from previous challenges)
- Grid floor rushing toward player (like the typing arena background)
- Glowing neon obstacles (walls, barriers, ramps)
- Motion blur / speed lines at high velocity
- Screen shake on near-misses, big shake + flash on death
- Particle trail behind the bike

AUDIO (Web Audio API):
- Continuous engine hum that pitch-shifts with speed
- Whoosh sounds for near-misses
- Satisfying jump sound
- Crash explosion on death
- Retro beeps for checkpoints/speed increases

DIFFICULTY PROGRESSION:
- Start manageable, ramp to brutal
- Introduce new obstacle types over time
- By 60 seconds it should feel like chaos
- Include "warning" indicators for upcoming obstacles

Make it feel like that "flow state or die" tension where you're reacting on pure instinct. All self-contained in a single HTML file.
note: Inspired by Battletoads Turbo Tunnel and Fusion Frenzy Twisted System
